title: Girl guides parade at Windsor Castle (19/6/1938)
brief_description: On June 19, 1938 a thousand Guides from all over the country marched past their majesties the King and Queen in the quadrangle of Windsor Castle. Her Majesty is patroness of the Association. Silent film - no credits or title available.
